#summary Compiling
= How to compile P3DFFT =
./configure --with-fftw3=<path to FFTW3 library> FCFLAGS=<Fortran compiler flags> CFLAGS=<C compiler flags> LDFLAGS=<libraries to link>


=== How to compile on Triton using PGI ===
./configure --with-fftw3="/opt/pgi/fftw_pgi" FCFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64 -Mextend -byteswapio" CFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64 -DPGI" LDFLAGS="-lmpi_f90 -lmpi_f77 -pgf90libs -lmyriexpress"
